description:
Tax-exempt beer sales

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
73421 Beer tax statistics

Definition:
Beer is exempt from tax, for example, when it is used for
commercial purposes or when breweries provide it free to
their employees. Beer exported to EU Member States and third
countries is also exempt from tax.


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2017
name: Tax-exempt beer sales
